DOC.brief_summary: To show an increase in annual growth rate 3 years after Visit 2. Annual growth rate in standard deviation (SD) after 3 years will be compared to growth rate before the start of GH treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Growth Retardation In Children With Special Pathological Conditions Or Disease
DOC.criteria: Bone age < 13 years for a boy and < 11 years for a girl Naive child: Measured Height < 2.5 SD for CA Child currently treated by GH Idiopathic short stature Syndrome known to be associated with an increased risk of cancer e.g. family history of adenomatous polyposis
